snippet: A retired police officer charged with murder in the shooting death of a fellow moviegoer during a dispute over texting has been granted release on bond, his lawyer said Friday.
abstract: Curtis J Reeves Jr, retired police officer charged with murder in shooting death of Chad Oulson at theater outside Tampa, Fla, is granted release on bond and is to stay on house arrest.
lead_paragraph: A retired police officer charged with murder in the shooting death of a fellow moviegoer during a dispute over texting has been granted release on bond, his lawyer said Friday.

headline.main: Florida: Defendant in Theater Killing Granted Bond
headline.print_headline: Florida: Defendant in Theater Killing Granted Bond
